bibl.title: Letter from James Carroll to Howard A. Kelly, December 17, 1906

div1.p: Carroll requests the return of his letter describing a post mortem exam.

div1.head: Letter from James Carroll to Howard A. Kelly, December 17, 1906
div1.p:
I find
that my letter reporting
the result of the post
mortem examination
has not yet been received.

Will you kindly return
it as soon as convenient
and greatly oblige,
div1.closer:
Yours very sincerely, James Carroll I was extremely sorry that a
former engagement made it im-
possible for me to accept your kind
invitation to dinner the other evening.
J.C.
